data: {"generalSituation":"A cold front will move across the coast of Guangdong later today. Winds will strengthen from the north with one or two rain patches over the region, and temperatures will fall appreciably. Under the influence of the associated dry northeast monsoon, it will be cool in the morning and at night over the coast of southern China in the next couple of days. With the monsoon moderating midweek next week, the weather will improve over the region with temperatures rising gradually. But the temperature difference between day and night will be relatively large over the inland areas. A broad band of clouds is expected to bring a few rain patches to southern China in the latter part of next week.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251213","week":"Saturday","forecastWind":"East force 4 to 5, becoming north later, occasionally force 6 offshore and up to force 7 on high ground.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy. One or two rain patches later.
